page.title: 15LUDFORD _ BEE KEEPING
page.content: JT has kept bees 45 years since a boy describing himself as a Migratory Bee Keeper. Has 150 Hives now on 4 nearby sites for winter. In May when Oil Seed Rape flowers hives will move to those fields and later to Bean Fields. Bees welcomed by Farmers as they can incr_ _ease crop by 15%.Farming changes _ disappearance of grazing and White Clover means rape and beans are only substitute. After beans have flowered Hives move to N.Yorkshire Moors for Heather crop.Heather enables bees to provide their own food for winter they need 30 lbs _ and with luck give the Bee Keeper a surplus _ Over a ton in 1984 but little in wet summer of 1985 when they had to be given 20 gallons of sugar syrup to prevent starvation. Bees very susceptible to farmers' insecticide sprays _ 28 hives badly damaged 1985 & 100 Hives lost in 10 yr
